Card grid

The card grid is grid layout of two or more cards. Card grid is a great way to showcase small bits of important information, and are often used in rows to display services or features. Image or icon can either appear above the card's text, or to the left of the text.

Basic

  • Example
  • Source code
Example

Elegant Design

Curabitur ut augue at mi eleifend lobortis. Ut tincidunt lacinia nisi pharetra.

Read More about Elegant Design

Read More about ADA Compliant

Fully Responsive

  • By: Alex

Incredible standard post

Nullam elementum tincidunt massa, a pulvinar leo ultricies ut. Ut fringilla lectus tellusimp imperdiet molestie est volutpat at. Sed viverra cursus nibh.
